Detailed Description

Main class of the EOS Kernel module.

(Lua binding interface: mapped to eos.module.load)

Loads a module in EOS environment

Parameters:

Returns:
true in case of success, false otherwise

int EOSKernel::processCreate ( lua_State *  luaRuntime  )  [static]

(Lua binding interface: mapped to eos.process.create)

Returns the time (in seconds) since application started

Parameters:
processName - name of the new Process to create. The name must be unique.
scriptName - name of the script to use for the process. A script can be used for many processes.
Returns:
true in case of success, false otherwise

int EOSKernel::processExists ( lua_State *  luaRuntime  )  [static]

(Lua binding interface: mapped to eos.process.exists)

Tests the existence of a process

Parameters:
processName - name of Process to test
Returns:
true if the process exists, false otherwise

int EOSKernel::processSetActive ( lua_State *  luaRuntime  )  [static]

(Lua binding interface: mapped to eos.process.setActive)

Sets the activity status of a Process

Parameters:
processName - name of the Process
activity - the activity status (true|false) to set
Returns:
true if case of success, false otherwise

int EOSKernel::processIsActive ( lua_State *  luaRuntime  )  [static]

(Lua binding interface: mapped to eos.process.isActive)

Sets the activity status of a Process

Parameters:
processName - name of the Process
Returns:
current activity status of the process (true: active, false: inactive)

(Lua binding interface: mapped to eos.process.destroy)

Destroys a Process

Parameters:
processName - name of the Process to destroy
Returns:
true if case of success, false otherwise

(Lua binding interface: mapped to eos.message.init)

Initializes a message structure

Parameters:
messageClass - class of the message (tipically a string that identifies the sender, or the type of the message)

int EOSKernel::messagePushData ( lua_State *  luaRuntime  )  [static]

(Lua binding interface: mapped to eos.message.pushData)

Pushes a data pair (key, value) in a previously initialized message (see messageInit)

Parameters:
keyName - name of the data field to push (the 'key')
valueData - value to push: it can be a Boolean, a Numeric, or a String

int EOSKernel::messageSend ( lua_State *  luaRuntime  )  [static]

(Lua binding interface: mapped to eos.message.send)

Sends a previously initialized and prepared message

Parameters:
receiverProcessName - name of the receiver process

int EOSKernel::setConsoleLogLevel ( lua_State *  luaRuntime  )  [static]

(Lua binding interface: mapped to eos.log.setConsoleLogLevel)

Sets the verbosity level (on stderr) of the EOS Kernel

Parameters:
verbosityLevel - max message level to dump on stderr. (A constant between eos.kernel.[ LOGLEVEL_NONE | LOGLEVEL_ERR | LOGLEVEL_WARN | LOGLEVEL_DBUG | LOGLEVEL_USER | LOGLEVEL_INFO ] )
